snippet: A Connecticut man was arraigned on Wednesday on a charge of criminally negligent homicide in the death of his 15-month-old son who was left alone in a car for hours on a hot July afternoon while his father was at work....

headline.print_headline: Connecticut Father Arraigned on Homicide Charge in Son's Hot Car Death
headline.main: Connecticut Father Arraigned on Homicide Charge in Son's Hot Car Death

lead_paragraph: A Connecticut man was arraigned on Wednesday on a charge of criminally negligent homicide in the death of his 15-month-old son who was left alone in a car for hours on a hot July afternoon while his father was at work.
